body: This is easily the best mixed wrestling manga ever made.  I love the way she humiliates her opponent right in front of MC.  After that she puts him into that skimpy bikini and proceeds to kick his ass in the ring.  Showing the results during their match with the duration of the round and how she won makes it all the better.  I really hope this gets a sequel because I will read that the day it is released.
Isn't this just a copy of ariku / mitsunoho arts
wow that crzay like a slut
No need to project your insecurities Mike. Looks like you need to see a therapist to work out some serious issues.
Should add wrestling to the Tag.
